verses.text:
Now \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* it came to pass, that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, \w Moses’|strong="H4872"\w* \w minister|strong="H8334"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* is \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*; now therefore \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* this \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, thou, and all this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which I do \w give|strong="H5414"\w* to them, \add even\add* to the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Every \w place|strong="H4725"\w* that the \w sole|strong="H3709"\w* of your \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* shall tread \w upon|strong="H1869"\w*, that have I \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto you, as I \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

From the \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* and this \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* even unto the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w river|strong="H5104"\w*, the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \w Euphrates|strong="H6578"\w*, all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, and unto the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* toward the going \w down|strong="H3996"\w* of the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*, shall be your \w coast|strong="H1366"\w*.

There shall not any \w man|strong="H0376"\w* be able to \w stand|strong="H3320"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee all the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of thy \w life|strong="H2416"\w*: as I was with \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \add so\add* I will be with thee: I will not \w fail|strong="H7503"\w* thee, nor \w forsake|strong="H5800"\w* thee.

Be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* and of a good \w courage|strong="H0553"\w*: for unto this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shalt thou divide for an \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which I \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them.\f + \fr 1.6 \ft unto this…: or, thou shalt cause this people to inherit the land, etc\f*

Only be thou \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* and \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w courageous|strong="H0553"\w*, that thou mayest \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to all the \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* my \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee: \w turn|strong="H5493"\w* not from it \add to\add* the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* or \add to\add* the \w left|strong="H8040"\w*, that thou mayest \w prosper|strong="H7919"\w* whithersoever thou \w goest|strong="H3212"\w*.\f + \fr 1.7 \ft prosper: or, do wisely\f*

This \w book|strong="H5612"\w* of the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* shall not \w depart|strong="H4185"\w* out of thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*; but thou shalt \w meditate|strong="H1897"\w* therein \w day|strong="H3119"\w* and \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, that thou mayest \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to all that is \w written|strong="H3789"\w* therein: for then thou shalt \w make|strong="H6743"\w* thy \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w prosperous|strong="H6743"\w*, and then thou shalt have good \w success|strong="H7919"\w*.\f + \fr 1.8 \ft have…: or, do wisely\f*

Have not I \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee? Be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* and of a good \w courage|strong="H0553"\w*; be not \w afraid|strong="H6206"\w*, neither be thou \w dismayed|strong="H2865"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* with thee whithersoever thou \w goest|strong="H3212"\w*.
¶ Then \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* the \w officers|strong="H7860"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w through|strong="H7130"\w* the \w host|strong="H4264"\w*, and \w command|strong="H6680"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Prepare|strong="H3559"\w* you \w victuals|strong="H6720"\w*; for within \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* ye shall pass \w over|strong="H5674"\w* this \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, to go \w in|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* you to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it.

¶ And to the \w Reubenites|strong="H7206"\w*, and to the \w Gadites|strong="H1425"\w*, and to \w half|strong="H2677"\w* the \w tribe|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* you, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath given you \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*, and hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* you this \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

Your \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, your little \w ones|strong="H2945"\w*, and your \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*, shall \w remain|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* you on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*; but ye shall \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w armed|strong="H2571"\w*, all the \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* men of \w valour|strong="H2428"\w*, and \w help|strong="H5826"\w* them;\f + \fr 1.14 \ft armed: Heb. marshalled by five\f*

Until the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* have \w given|strong="H5117"\w* your \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w rest|strong="H5117"\w*, as \add he hath given\add* you, and they also have \w possessed|strong="H3423"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* them: then ye shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of your \w possession|strong="H3425"\w*, and \w enjoy|strong="H3423"\w* it, which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* the 
d \+w LORD’s|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* you on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* toward the \w sunrising|strong="H4217"\w*.

¶ And they \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, All that thou \w commandest|strong="H6680"\w* us we will \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, and \w whithersoever|strong="H0834"\w* thou \w sendest|strong="H7971"\w* us, we will \w go|strong="H3212"\w*.

According as we \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* in all things, so will we \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto thee: only the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* be with thee, as he was with \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w Whosoever|strong="H0376"\w* \add he be\add* that doth \w rebel|strong="H4784"\w* against thy \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w*, and will not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w* in all that thou \w commandest|strong="H6680"\w* him, he shall be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*: only be \w strong|strong="H2388"\w* and of a good \w courage|strong="H0553"\w*.
